divs: Sighting DetailsOn January 16th, something was hovering above the house of a friend. His 10 year old son and adult femal neighbor were outside and took a picture with their camera phone. All other details would have to be gotten by them. I am a family friend (Kyle Fernung) who is reporting it for them. Their contact information is listed above.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Windfall
There were no other sightings in Windfall on or around January 16th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Something hovering above a house in Windfall Indiana
